#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int max(int num){
    int max=1;
    while(num>0){
        if(max<num%10)
            max = num%10;
        num=num/10;
    }
    return max;
}

int convert(int num, int base){
    int a = 0, power=0;
    while(num>0){
        int last = num%10;
        last = last*pow(base, power);
        a+=last;
        num=num/10;
        power++;
    }
    return a;
}

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int a, b, c, d;
        cin >> a >> b;
        c = max(a);
        d = max(b);
        if(c!=9)
            a = convert(a, c+1);
        if(d!=9)
            b = convert(b, d+1);
        cout << a+b << endl;
    }    
    return 0;
}
